cards.title: Existing EV batteries may last up to 40% longer than expected
cards.description: Consumers’ real-world stop-and-go driving of electric vehicles benefits batteries more than the steady use simulated in almost all laboratory tests of new battery designs, Stanford-SLAC study finds.
